title: Salter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to prepare to Crush a player with your hammer. Tommorow night, you can't do actions, and instead attack your target.
- At night, you may instead Salt two players, visiting both. If a Salted player dies that night, you clean them and your next use of Crush has no preparation time, instead happening the same night you select it to happen.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Visitors of the player you Crush permanently lose one stage of defense. If they go below Vulnerable, they die. They are told "You were caught in the impact of a Salter's (4469) crushing blow! Your defense was lowered!"
- At the start of the night, you learn of each role whose player has Vulnerable defense. You do not learn which players have that role.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the Peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4469
*Bygone grievances linger like salt in the wounds.*
